title: Ava Raine
summary:
Simone Garcia Johnson (born August 14, 2001) is an American model and professional wrestler. She is currently signed to WWE, where she performs on the NXT brand under the ring name Ava. She is a part of the faction The Schism, alogside Joe Gacy and The Dyad (Rip Fowler and Jagger Reid).
Johnson is a fourth-generation wrestler who is the daughter of Dwayne Johnson, better known as The Rock. She is a member of the Maivia-Anoa'i family of Samoan wrestlers.
